__TOC__

 
* Contact: AngeloLisco
* Make: IBM
* Brand: ThinkPad
* Model: X40
* Website: http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/Category:X40

=== Specifications ===

* Intel(R) Pentium(R) M processor 1.40 GHz
* 512MB RAM
* 40GB Hard Disk
* IDE Controller: Intel Corporation 82801DBM (ICH4-M)
* Graphic card: Intel Corporation 82852/855GM Integrated Graphics Device
* USB 1.1 Controller: Intel Corporation 82801DB/DBL/DBM (ICH4/ICH4-L/ICH4-M) USB UHCI Controller
* USB 2.0 Controller: Intel Corporation 82801DB/DBM (ICH4/ICH4-M) USB2 EHCI Controller
* Multimedia audio controller: Intel Corporation 82801DB/DBL/DBM (ICH4/ICH4-L/ICH4-M) AC'97
* Modem: Intel Corporation 82801DB/DBL/DBM (ICH4/ICH4-L/ICH4-M) AC'97
* Pcmcia/CardBus controller: Ricoh Co Ltd RL5c476 II
* MMC/SD card reader: Ricoh Co Ltd R5C822 SD/SDIO/MMC/MS/MSPro
* Ethernet controller: Intel Corporation 82541GI Gigabit Ethernet Controller
* Wireless network controller: Intel Corporation PRO/Wireless 2200BG

* Toys:
** Hard drive shock protection
** Bluetooth
** Secure digital card reader

=== Current Issues ===
Currently the biggest issues appear to be:
* '''X crashes when launching totem after a suspend-resume cycle''' <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/bugs/28326|#28326]]</nowiki>
* '''Clone Mode makes external display very blurry/wobbly''' <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-driver-i810/+bug/36550|#36550]]</nowiki>
* '''Wireless button (Fn+F5) toggles wifi and bluetooth at the same time''' <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/acpi-support/+bug/24680|#24680]]</nowiki>
* '''No support for the internal modem''' <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=14288|#14288]]</nowiki>

=== Old Issues (fixed in dapper) ===
* Sleep and hibernate doesn't work when docked to an UltraBase X4 <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/acpi-support/+bug/30410|#30410]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.15/+bug/29767/+index|#29767]]</nowiki> - '''Fixed in 2.6.15-21-386'''
* IBM Active Protection System driver (hdaps) not working - '''Fixed in 2.6.15-21-386'''
